functions.name: createPopup
functions.description: Pops up a modal dialog notifying the participant that their search engine has been changed and asks the participant if they would like to change it back.

parameters.name: searchEngineOld
parameters.description: The name of the search engine that their default was changed from.

parameters.name: searchEngineNew
parameters.description: The name of the search engine that their default was changed to.

parameters.name: modalPrimaryRevert
parameters.description: Whether the option to change their search engine back on the modal dialog will be the primary button.

functions.name: changeSearchEngine
functions.description: Changes the participant's default search engine.

parameters.name: searchEngineName
parameters.description: The name of the search engine to make default. Should be either 'Google', 'DuckDuckGo', 'Yahoo', 'Bing', 'Ecosia', 'Yandex', 'Baidu', or 'Ask'.

functions.name: getSearchEngine
functions.description: Get the participant's current default search engine in the browser.

functions.name: changeHomepage
functions.description: Changes the participant's current homepage in the browser.

parameters.name: homepage
parameters.description: The URL that the homepage should be changed to.

functions.name: getHomepage
functions.description: A promise for the participant's current '|' separated homepage URLs.
